segments.text: You'll never guess what happened today ! I went to the doctor after work and the doctor told me ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And the doctor told you to start listening to Bach ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No ... He told me I'm pregnant !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And so I bought all these books on having kids and ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And they said you should play classical music ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did you know ! They say listening to classical music can make your baby smarter !
segments.speaker: S2
